attributes.action: Remove all rights to any British citizens if they join isis including stateless
attributes.additional_details:
Why should we allow someone who has left the safety of the uk to go and join isis groups come back to the United Kingdom.
And potentially put lifes at risk by possibly eradicating others or even their own children 
Our safety first before there's
attributes.background:
To remove all rights to a British citizen if they leave the uk to join or a assist with isis groups. 
Even if this leaves them stateless
